text: Brachyotum rotundifolium is a species of plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forests and subtropical or tropical high-altitude shrubland. ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador rotundifolium Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Brachyotum rotundifolium
